cves.description: Exploit toolkit CVE-2017-8759 - v1.0 is a handy python script which provides pentesters and security researchers a quick and effective way to test Microsoft .NET Framework RCE. It could generate a malicious RTF file and deliver metasploit / meterpreter / other payload to victim without any complex configuration.

CVE-2017-8759 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability On SOAP WDSL - Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6.2  Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6.1  Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5.1  Microsoft .NET Framework 4.7  Microsoft .NET Framework 4.6  Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2  Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5
